description:
Attorney Bruce M. Plaxen founded the law firm of Plaxen & Adler, P.A., in 1985 with the goal of providing a voice to victims of negligence in Maryland. Today, from our nine office locations, including the one in Columbia, we still strive toward that very same goal by representing victims in lawsuits involving the following:

  • Automobile accidents
  • Birth injuries, such as cerebral palsy
  • Dog bites
  • Elevator and escalator injuries
  • Fungal meningitis
  • Medical malpractice
  • Workers’ compensation
  • Product liability
  • Premises liability
  • Slip and falls
  • Social Security Disability
  • Wrongful death

Since our law firm opened its doors nearly 30 years ago, it has grown into one of the state's most highly respected personal injury firms. We now have three experienced attorneys, our founder Bruce Plaxen, partner Harry R. Adler and associate attorney David A. Muncy, along with a team of highly experienced paralegals.

If you are suffering because of another person's negligence, you have rights, and at Plaxen & Adler, P.A., we work diligently to protect those rights. If you are interested in learning how our law firm can help you during the aftermath of an accident, you can take advantage of our free initial consultation, which we can schedule for an evening or weekend if that better suits your schedule. If you are unable to visit one of our office locations, one of our attorneys will gladly come to you.
